v8:item.v8:content: For discounts included in the "Apply sequentially" group it determines their sequence. For discounts included in the "Displace" group, it determines priority of discounts inside the group.
Determines the way the system will behave if there are several overlapping discounts.

Properties.Name: Selected
Properties.Comment: (Common) Shows a selected day of the week

v8:item.v8:content: Items (subject to the hierarchy), item group or price group, having the indicated discount (mark-up) value applicable to its item positions.
Discount value which type depends on provision method.
